actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-253, by Mr. Moakley.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 407 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Upon the adoption of this rule, it shall be in order to consider the joint resolution in the House and all points of order against its consideration shall be waived. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments. Amendments may be offered, subject to recogition by the manager of the joint resolution.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 56.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 407) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 407 (continuing appropriations).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 407) making continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1990, and for other purposes.
